definition: USB flash drive/jump drive/thumb drive/memory stick

to dodge/to duck out of the way/to beat it/shaken (by a fall)/to sprain/to pull a muscle/lightning/spark/a flash/to flash (across one's mind)/to leave behind/(Internet slang) (of a display of affection) "dazzlingly" saccharine

sentences.english: U disk, or USB (Universal Serial Bus) flash drive, is a small type of hard drive.
sentences.chinese: 盘，也叫USB闪存盘，是一种小型的硬盘。

sentences.english: Unique flash drive will inspire you to cure computer viruses.
sentences.chinese: 能鼓舞你战胜计算机病毒的独特闪存盘。

sentences.english: Photographers will love this creative film roll shaped flash drive.
sentences.chinese: 摄像师会喜欢这款有创意的胶卷型闪存盘。

definition: USB flash drive/see also 閃存盤|闪存盘[shan3 cun2 pan2]
Blu-ray disk, Sony high definition DVD disk
